fields.name: sidebar_label
fields.label: Sidebar Label
fields.placeholder: The label that will appear in the sidebar navigation for this document.

fields.name: slug
fields.label: Slug
fields.placeholder: Defines the URL path for the document. For example, setting slug: /custom-path makes the document available at /docs/custom-path

fields.name: sidebar_position
fields.label: Sidebar Position
fields.placeholder: Defines the order in which the document will appear in the sidebar.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
